job_tasks.phrase: set up a world class data function, managing a lake with PB scale data and building complex audio/visual data pipelines to bring order and make data consumption simple.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the setup and management of data infrastructure and pipelines, which aligns with the definition of MLOps/DataOps.

job_tasks.phrase: set up and provide data management for our ML teams in R&D
job_tasks.justification: This task involves managing data for ML teams, which falls under the operational and infrastructure support aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: set up our audio-video data pipeline for the Video team and our speech data pipeline for the Voice team.
job_tasks.justification: Building and setting up data pipelines for specific teams is a core responsibility within MLOps/DataOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Data storage - our data lake for large scale audio-visual datasets
job_tasks.justification: Managing data storage, specifically a data lake, is an operational task related to data infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Data sources - set up our ingest process, working with external data providers
job_tasks.justification: Setting up data ingestion processes is a key part of managing data pipelines and infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Data annotation - manage data verification and annotation, working with external providers
job_tasks.justification: Managing data annotation is a crucial part of the data preparation pipeline, falling under operational data management.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines - deploy custom ML data transformations, working with our ML teams
job_tasks.justification: Deploying data transformations within ML pipelines is a direct MLOps responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Data access - create transient data-sets on demand to support ML model training
job_tasks.justification: Providing data access for ML model training is an operational task related to data management and infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Data tracking - usage tracking and monitoring across all data sources
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring data usage is an operational task for managing and understanding data infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: help R&D manage large data-sets of audio-video data at Synthesia.
job_tasks.justification: Managing large datasets is a core aspect of data engineering.
Building data pipelines, especially complex ones, is a key task in data engineering.
Simplifying data consumption is a goal of effective data engineering and management.
While broad, this implies enabling research through data, which is a function of data engineering.

soft_skills.justification: This implies interaction and collaboration with external entities.
This indicates collaboration with internal teams.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily focuses on managing and building data pipelines, data lakes, and data ingestion processes (Macro-Category A, specifically 1.A.2 and 1.B.3). While it supports ML teams and mentions 'ML Platform Engineer', it does not detail tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). The core responsibilities are infrastructure and data management for ML, fitting the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer who builds and maintains the systems that support AI/ML models.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is quite clear about the responsibilities revolving around data infrastructure and pipelines. However, it doesn't explicitly mention generative AI tasks or traditional ML model development, making it lean towards a platform/data engineering role supporting AI/ML rather than a direct AI/ML development role. The confidence is high due to the detailed description of data management tasks.
